snippet.title: Infinikin Pre-Alpha Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing Infinikin, a run-based monster battling randomizer with procedurally generated monsters and attacks that permanently run out! This short pre-alpha trailer was featured in the Monster Taming Direct 2024.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2931760/Infinikin/

Gameplay footage shown is still in development and likely to change.
